name: DoppelDead
description:
You wake up in a distorted mirror world, with you and your reflection... and your other reflection. Wait what? I guess there is no time to ponder, that's your doppelganger and you need to kill them before they kill you! But how can kill something that does everything you do?

This is for the Minijam 103: Darkness Game Jam. I joined a little late, but here's my entry I made in one day! Try to beat it with the least amount of lives lost, my record was 25.

CONTROLS:

  • [WASD] - Move
  • (Left Mouse Button) - Shoot
  • [R] - Restart Level
  • [O/P] Change Character Color
